name: openproject-mcp
description: MCP server integration for comprehensive work package management and artifact storage. Enables real-time tracking of Epics, Features, Stories, Tasks, and Bugs throughout the development lifecycle. Provides document storage as attachments at appropriate work package levels. Used by all BMAD agents for work-driven development workflow.

name: genimage-mcp
description: MCP server integration for AI-powered UI mockup and wireframe generation. Enables UX Designer agent to create visual designs, user interface mockups, and wireframes for features and stories. Supports image generation for UI specifications and design artifacts that are attached to work packages in OpenProject.
